mapper.select: select item_num,item_name, item_price, item_count,item_thumb,item_detailImg,item_organs from item where item_deleted_yn ='N' order by item_created_at desc;
select * from item where item_organs = #{itemOrgans} and item_deleted_yn = 'N' order by item_created_at desc;
select * from item where item_deleted_yn = 'N' and item_num = #{itemNum}
mapper.insert: insert into item (item_num, item_name, item_price, item_thumb, item_detailImg, item_maker, item_how, item_expDate, item_materials, item_organs, item_thumb_name, item_detailImg_name ) values (#{itemNum}, #{itemName},#{itemPrice},#{itemThumb},#{itemDetailImg},#{itemMaker},#{itemHow},#{itemExpDate}, #{itemMaterials}, #{itemOrgans},#{itemThumbName},#{itemDetailImgName})
